title: Food insecurity and the risk of sleep disorders in people living with HIV/AIDS as a neglected health concern: A national survey in Iran
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Fatemeh Hadavandsiri, Safieh Mohammad nejad, Marziyeh Mahboobi, Arezu Najafi, Mohammad Ebrahimzadeh Mousavi, Sayed Hassan Faghihi, Narges Abdolmohamadi, Samaneh Akbarpour
